mapper.select: select * from v_pimachievements t1 where pimachievementsid=#{id}
select * from v_pimachievements t1 where pimachievementsid=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DJ`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`EVALUATIONUNIT`, t1.`JD`, t1.`JSRQ`, t1.`KHDF`, t1.`KHJL`, t1.`KHLX`, t11.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t11.`ORMORGID`, t11.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`PIMACHIEVEMENTSID`, t1.`PIMACHIEVEMENTSNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`QSRQ`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XMJB`, t1.`YD`, t11.`YGBH` FROM `T_PIMACHIEVEMENTS` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DJ, t1.ENABLE, t1.EVALUATIONUNIT, t1.JD, t1.JSRQ, t1.KHDF, t1.KHJL, t1.KHLX, t11.ORMORGID AS ORGID, t11.ORMORGSECTORID AS ORGSECTORID, t11.ORMORGID, t11.ORMORGSECTORID, t1.PIMACHIEVEMENTSID, t1.PIMACHIEVEMENTSNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t11.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.QSRQ, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XMJB, t1.YD, t11.YGBH FROM T_PIMACHIEVEMENTS t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DJ`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`EVALUATIONUNIT`, t1.`JD`, t1.`JSRQ`, t1.`KHDF`, t1.`KHJL`, t1.`KHLX`, t11.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t11.`ORMORGID`, t11.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`PIMACHIEVEMENTSID`, t1.`PIMACHIEVEMENTSNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`QSRQ`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XMJB`, t1.`YD`, t11.`YGBH` FROM `T_PIMACHIEVEMENTS` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.`PIMPERSONID` = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID} )

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DJ, t1.ENABLE, t1.EVALUATIONUNIT, t1.JD, t1.JSRQ, t1.KHDF, t1.KHJL, t1.KHLX, t11.ORMORGID AS ORGID, t11.ORMORGSECTORID AS ORGSECTORID, t11.ORMORGID, t11.ORMORGSECTORID, t1.PIMACHIEVEMENTSID, t1.PIMACHIEVEMENTSNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t11.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.QSRQ, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XMJB, t1.YD, t11.YGBH FROM T_PIMACHIEVEMENTS t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.PIMPERSONID = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID} )

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DJ`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`EVALUATIONUNIT`, t1.`JD`, t1.`JSRQ`, t1.`KHDF`, t1.`KHJL`, t1.`KHLX`, t11.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t11.`ORMORGID`, t11.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`PIMACHIEVEMENTSID`, t1.`PIMACHIEVEMENTSNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`QSRQ`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XMJB`, t1.`YD`, t11.`YGBH` FROM `T_PIMACHIEVEMENTS` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.`PIMPERSONID` = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID} )

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DJ, t1.ENABLE, t1.EVALUATIONUNIT, t1.JD, t1.JSRQ, t1.KHDF, t1.KHJL, t1.KHLX, t11.ORMORGID AS ORGID, t11.ORMORGSECTORID AS ORGSECTORID, t11.ORMORGID, t11.ORMORGSECTORID, t1.PIMACHIEVEMENTSID, t1.PIMACHIEVEMENTSNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t11.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.QSRQ, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XMJB, t1.YD, t11.YGBH FROM T_PIMACHIEVEMENTS t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.PIMPERSONID = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID} )
